original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Venerable Rajanganaye Saddharathana Thero was arrested in Anuradhapra on the charge of making comments that harm religious coexistence in Sri Lanka.
Police Spokesperson SSP Nihal Thalduwa speaking to News 1st said that the Venerable Thero was arrested by the Criminal Investigations Department on Monday (29) morning.
